snippet.title: Funko Fusion - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience a festival of fandom like never before in Funko Fusion!

Play through iconic worlds and mash up characters inspired by some of your favourite franchises in an action-adventure game with uniquely authentic, irreverent humour from the creative minds of 10:10 Games.

Coming to PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch on September 13, 2024.

Visit https://funkofusion.com for more information

Follow us on social for updates:
X - https://x.com/funkofusiongame
Instagram - https://instagram.com/funkofusiongame
Facebook - https://facebook.com/funkofusiongame
Threads - https://threads.net/@funkofusiongame
TikTok - https://tiktok.com/@funkofusiongame
